price: Pada hari ketika muka mereka dibolak-balikan dalam neraka, mereka berkata, "Alangkah baiknya, andaikata kami taat kepada Allah dan taat (pula) kepada rasul".
arabic: يَوۡمَ تُقَلَّبُ وُجُوهُهُمۡ فِي ٱلنَّارِ يَقُولُونَ يَٰلَيۡتَنَآ أَطَعۡنَا ٱللَّهَ وَأَطَعۡنَا ٱلرَّسُولَا۠

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: yawma tuqallabu wujūhuhum fī al-nāri yaqūlūna yālaytanā aṭaʿnā al-laha wa-aṭaʿnā al-rasūlā
